title: WHIRLING F1 / EXIT DOOR
description: this is a crazy-ass exit-from-whirling door, god dammit.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Listen up, pig! Cuno's gonna scram..."
dialogueTree.text: "Listen up, pig! Cuno's gonna scram now." He rubs his hands together.

links.title: Cuno: ""See you on the seafort island -- t..."
links.text: "See you on the seafort island -- try not to get shot again or drunk or shit. Cuno's counting on you."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "Cuno will rejoin your party later."
links.text: Cuno will rejoin your party later.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's gonna scram now." He rubs h..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno's gonna scram now." He rubs his hands together. "Can't be seen with pigs. Can't shit on Cuno's good name."

links.title: Cuno: ""So yeah -- see you on the seafort..."
links.text: "So yeah -- see you on the seafort island. Try not to get shot or drunk again. Cuno's counting on your ass."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Hold up, piggo. There's something..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hold up, piggo. There's something you gotta understand about the Cuno first." He drags his sleeve across his nose. "Cuno's gotta protect the Cuno name."

links.title: Cuno: ""The gimps out there ain't gonna th..."
links.text: "The gimps out there ain't gonna think we a thing. Cuno will follow you, but don't expect anything *extra* okay, pig? Cuno's silent, like a fucking vegetable."

links.title: Cuno: ""And don't forget about that bitch'..."
links.text: "And don't forget about that bitch's window. Scope that shit. Cop Cuno's telling you, that's the break in the case."

dialogueTree.text: As you approach the door leading out of the hostel, the bespectacled man in an orange bomber jacket turns to you:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me... I think you may be th..."
links.text: "Excuse me... I think you may be the person I've been waiting for." He narrows his eyes and extends his hand in greeting.
